thread.title: Derby man missing on Greek holiday island
thread.title_full: Derby man missing on Greek holiday island | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Derby man missing on Greek holiday island
text:
Police say they're concerned for the safety of a 56-year-old man from Derby who's gone missing on the Greek island of Rhodes. Clive Garner from Peel Street was due to return to the UK yesterday. He flew alone to island from East Midlands Airport on Wednesday, July 15.
He arrived and checked in to the Gregory Studio Apartments in Lindos where he spent a couple of days in and around the hotel.
He was last seen on Saturday, July 18 by his tour operator wearing a winter coat.
“We are growing increasingly concerned for Mr Garner as he has not been seen for several days.
“We would urge anyone that is travelling to Rhodes or is on holiday there at the moment and sees Mr Garner to contact Rhodes Police on 100 or tell a police officer or a travel representative.”
– Detective Chief Inspector Nick Lamb, Derbyshire Police Last updated Thu 30 Jul 2015 Travel Missing Greece
